document_api_meta.title: Get Affiliate Campaign Creator Product Content Statistics
document_api_meta.env_desc: Get statistics on creator's marketing video content

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The partner access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 3. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3978f4c20311b8b555) to get partner access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: affiliate_product_id
request_query_param.desc: The affiliate product identifier to be included in the response. Refer to `promotion_creators.affiliate_product_id` in the response of Get Affiliate Campaign Creator Fulfillment Status Info gateway.

request_query_param.name: content_type
request_query_param.desc:
Content type.Identify content as video or live.
- 1: VIDEO
- 2: LIVE_ROOM

request_query_param.name: category_asset_cipher
request_query_param.desc: The partner identifier used in API requests. Retrieve this value by using the [Get Authorized Category Assets API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/666012dd609d4402cc3be995).

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^creator_content_statistics
response_param.desc: A list of objects that represent content statistics for the associated creator.

response_param.name: ^^content_type
response_param.desc:
Content type.Identify content as video or live.
- 1: VIDEO
- 2: LIVE_ROOM

response_param.name: ^^cover_img_url
response_param.desc: A URL for the live room cover image in the TikTok CDN.The video content doesn't have this value.

response_param.name: ^^source_url
response_param.desc: The URL on the public TikTok website at which the live room video can be played back. When content_type == VIDEO, the value is the url of the source video; when content_type == LIVE_ROOM, the value is the url where you can play back the recording of the live.

response_param.name: ^^view_count
response_param.desc: The number of public views of the live room or video.

response_param.name: ^^like_count
response_param.desc: The number of TikTok user likes associated with the live room or video.

response_param.name: ^^comment_num
response_param.desc: The number of TikTok user comments associated with the live room or video.

response_param.name: ^^paid_order_num
response_param.desc: The total number of paid orders associated with the live room or video.

response_param.name: ^^paid_amount
response_param.desc: The aggregate value of product orders associated with the live room or video.

response_param.name: ^^linked_tiktok_video
response_param.desc: The friendly URL for the video on the TikTok website.

response_param.name: ^^published_date
response_param.desc: When content_type == VIDEO, this is the date when the video was published; when content_type == LIVE_ROOM, this is the date when the live started. The value is in YYYY_MM_DD format.

response_param.name: ^^content_end_date
response_param.desc: When content_type == VIDEO, this field is None; when content_type == LIVE_ROOM, this is the date when the live ended. The value is in YYYY_MM_DD format.

error_code_list.msg: nvalid parameter Creator and Seller, please ensure Region mismatch.
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access a TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP) campaign information, including view campaign list and details and campaign product list and details.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP) campaign information, including your contact information, campaign list and details, and campaign product list and details.
